member.name: M:Avanteam.Directory.Authentication.AspNetCore.HrdManager.GetAutoSelectedIdp(System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection{Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AuthenticationScheme})
member.summary:
Gets the name of the IDP to automatically select it and skip display of the login page. This is: - the name returned by if the user has been authenticated with an IDP and its authentication expired on our side (but may be not on the IDP side). - Or if there is only a single authentication choice, the name of the IDP corresponding to that choice.
In other cases, this returns null, and the login page should be displayed.
